summary: This document is an email chain from late May 2020 discussing security concerns and threats. The primary sender reports receiving threatening phone calls, including a voicemail threatening their children. The correspondence involves coordinating with law enforcement for increased patrols and sharing location information for safety.

persons.name: Mark
persons.context: Appears as a recipient in the email chain, asking about progress on tracing the sources of threats.

events.title: Threatening Voicemail Received
events.description: A caller with a heavy Indian accent left a voicemail threatening that the recipient's children will die.

events.title: Request for Increased Police Patrols
events.description: A request was made to the local precinct near a 66th street address to increase patrol presence out of an abundance of caution.

keyFacts: The primary email author received threatening phone calls and a voicemail specifically threatening their children.
Law enforcement was contacted to increase patrols near a 66th street address for safety reasons.
The threatening email and LinkedIn message were traced to originate from outside the United States.
The correspondence indicates the author's ex-wife and children were at a separate location from the author, who planned to travel upstate.
